price: Ngunit kung tumigil sila, tunay na si Allāh ay Mapagpatawad, Maawain.
arabic: فَإِنِ ٱنتَهَوۡاْ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: fa-ini intahaw fa-inna al-laha ghafūrun raḥīmun
